english.segment1: Let me go back. And do it all over again. What i know now. I wish i knew then. There's a pain. That just will not die
english.segment2: Let me hear you say it's okay. Let me hear you say it's alright. I could really use some words of comfort. So i won't be alone tonight. So i won't be alone tonight
english.segment3: Let me move on. I've said I was sorry. Help me look out. And see the sun again. 'Cause there's a pain. That somehow must die
